title: Modernization Tasks Template
description: Schema for tasks-template.json. Preserve field descriptions because they are used to generate the JSON by LLM.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference used by the template.

description.description: Tasks template for modernization plan. Generate this file alongside plan.md to track individual migration tasks.

_comment.description: Human guidance for the task template; used by LLM and not required in generated tasks.json.

id.description: [Unique identifier for this task, start with sequence and category name, like '001-transform-migration-rabbitmq-to-servicebus']

description.description: [Brief description of what this task achieves from the user's perspective]

requirements.description: [The specific requirements for this task including: what to migrate (features, APIs, patterns), constraints (backward compatibility, modules to avoid), target Azure services, and technical preferences (authentication methods, patterns)]

dependencies.description: [id of the task this task depends on]

environmentConfiguration.description: [Environment configuration from user input (e.g. endpoint, access id), null if not specified]

status.description: Task execution status. Only has value after task is executed.

taskSummary.description: Summary of task execution result. Only has value after task is executed.

name.description: [The skill name that will be used for this task, e.g., 'migration-rabbitmq-to-servicebus']

location.description: Skill location: project, remote and builtin, builtin is renamed from custom

successCriteria.description: The task success criteria to validate after task execution.

passBuild.description: Project must compile successfully after migration, use default value if user does not specify

generateNewUnitTests.description: Create mock-based unit tests for newly added Azure integration code to ensure test coverage, use default value if user does not specify

generateNewIntegrationTests.description: Create integration tests for Azure service interactions. If Azure resources are provided: tests interact with actual services. If not: tests use mocked Azure SDK clients or test containers, use default value if user does not specify

passUnitTests.description: All unit tests must pass; mock dependent Azure resources if not provided, use default value if user does not specify

passIntegrationTests.description: Integration tests must pass when generated. With Azure resources: validates actual connectivity. Without: validates integration logic using mocked clients, use default value if user does not specify

successCriteriaStatus.description: Validation status for each success criteria. Only has values after success criteria validation is complete. true means passed, false means failed.

passBuild.description: Validation status of passBuild criterion. true means passed, false means failed, null means not yet validated.

generateNewUnitTests.description: Validation status of generateNewUnitTests criterion. true means passed, false means failed, null means not yet validated.

generateNewIntegrationTests.description: Validation status of generateNewIntegrationTests criterion. true means passed, false means failed, null means not yet validated.

passUnitTests.description: Validation status of passUnitTests criterion. true means passed, false means failed, null means not yet validated.

passIntegrationTests.description: Validation status of passIntegrationTests criterion. true means passed, false means failed, null means not yet validated.

skills.description: The skills that must be used for this task, e.g., 'migration-rabbitmq-to-servicebus-mi'
The skills that must be used for this task, e.g., 'migration-rabbitmq-to-servicebus-mi'

type.description: Containerization task template - Only include if the target deployment requires containerization (e.g., AKS, ACA) or if the user explicitly requested containerization. Skip for non-containerized deployments.

dockerfilePath.description: [Path to Dockerfile, indicate if existing or to be created]

type.description: Deployment task template - Only include if the user explicitly requested deployment.

targetAzureService.description: [Azure service name, e.g., Azure Container Apps, AKS, App Service]

resourceStatus.description: [Specify if using existing resource or will create new service]
